00384     void SetRuleBuffer(
00385         PyObject *buf,
00386         int neigh)
00387     {
00388         char *buffer =
00389             NULL;
00390         Py_ssize_t len =
00391             0;
00392 
00393         PyObject_AsReadBuffer(
00394             buf,
00395             (const void **)&buffer,
00396             &len);
00397 
00398         self->SetRuleTable(
00399             buffer, 
00400             (int)len, 
00401             neigh);
00402 
00403     }
00404 
00405 
00406 }

00419 #define EVENT_BOUNCE_TOP    0x0100
00420 #define EVENT_BOUNCE_BOTTOM 0x0200
00421 #define EVENT_BOUNCE_LEFT   0x0400
00422 #define EVENT_BOUNCE_RIGHT  0x0800
00423 #define EVENT_MOVE          0x1000

00429 #ifdef MACOS
00430 
00431 #define SWAPLONG(x) x
00432 
00433 #define BYTE0(x) ((x>>24)&0xff)
00434 #define BYTE1(x) ((x>>16)&0xff)
00435 #define BYTE2(x) ((x>>8)&0xff)
00436 #define BYTE3(x) (x&0xff)
00437 
00438 #define SETBYTE0(q, b) (q = (q & 0x00ffffff) | ((b << 24) & 0xff000000))
00439 #define SETBYTE1(q, b) (q = (q & 0xff00ffff) | ((b << 16) & 0x00ff0000))
00440 #define SETBYTE2(q, b) (q = (q & 0xffff00ff) | ((b << 8) & 0x0000ff00))
00441 #define SETBYTE3(q, b) (q = (q & 0xffffff00) | (b & 0x000000ff))
00442 
00443 #else
00444 
00445 #define SWAPLONG(x) ( \
00446     ((x <<24) & 0xff000000) | \
00447     ((x <<8)  & 0x00ff0000) | \
00448     ((x >>8)  & 0x0000ff00) | \
00449     ((x >>24) & 0x000000ff))
00450 
00451 #define BYTE3(x) ((x>>24)&0xff)
00452 #define BYTE2(x) ((x>>16)&0xff)
00453 #define BYTE1(x) ((x>>8)&0xff)
00454 #define BYTE0(x) (x&0xff)
00455 
00456 #define SETBYTE3(q, b) (q = (q & 0x00ffffff) | ((b << 24) & 0xff000000))
00457 #define SETBYTE2(q, b) (q = (q & 0xff00ffff) | ((b << 16) & 0x00ff0000))
00458 #define SETBYTE1(q, b) (q = (q & 0xffff00ff) | ((b << 8) & 0x0000ff00))
00459 #define SETBYTE0(q, b) (q = (q & 0xffffff00) | (b & 0x000000ff))
00460 
00461 #endif

00465 
00466 
00467 #define sNORTHWEST  16
00468 #define sNORTH      8
00469 #define sNORTHEAST  0
00470 #define sWEST       16
00471 #define sCENTER     8
00472 #define sEAST       0
00473 #define sSOUTHWEST  16
00474 #define sSOUTH      8
00475 #define sSOUTHEAST  0
00476 
00477 
00478 #define xNORTHWEST(m)   (l0 & (m << sNORTHWEST))
00479 #define xNORTH(m)       (l0 & (m << sNORTH))
00480 #define xNORTHEAST(m)   (l0 & (m << sNORTHEAST))
00481 #define xWEST(m)        (l1 & (m << sWEST))
00482 #define xCENTER(m)      (l1 & (m << sCENTER))
00483 #define xEAST(m)        (l1 & (m << sEAST))
00484 #define xSOUTHWEST(m)   (l2 & (m << sSOUTHWEST))
00485 #define xSOUTH(m)       (l2 & (m << sSOUTH))
00486 #define xSOUTHEAST(m)   (l2 & (m << sSOUTHEAST))
00487 
00488 
00489 #define NORTHWEST(m)    ((Byte)(xNORTHWEST(m) >> sNORTHWEST))
00490 #define NORTH(m)        ((Byte)(xNORTH(m) >> sNORTH))
00491 #define NORTHEAST(m)    ((Byte)(xNORTHEAST(m) >> sNORTHEAST))
00492 #define WEST(m)         ((Byte)(xWEST(m) >> sWEST))
00493 #define CENTER(m)       ((Byte)(xCENTER(m) >> sCENTER))
00494 #define EAST(m)         ((Byte)(xEAST(m) >> sEAST))
00495 #define SOUTHWEST(m)    ((Byte)(xSOUTHWEST(m) >> sSOUTHWEST))
00496 #define SOUTH(m)        ((Byte)(xSOUTH(m) >> sSOUTH))
00497 #define SOUTHEAST(m)    ((Byte)(xSOUTHEAST(m) >> sSOUTHEAST))
00498 
00499 
00500 #define SUM4(m) ( \
00501     (NORTH(m)) + \
00502     (WEST(m)) + \
00503     (EAST(m)) + \
00504     (SOUTH(m)))
00505 
00506 
00507 #define SUM8(m) ( \
00508     (SUM4(m)) + \
00509     (NORTHWEST(m)) + \
00510     (NORTHEAST(m)) + \
00511     (SOUTHWEST(m)) + \
00512     (SOUTHEAST(m)))
00513 
00514 
00515 #define SUM9(m) ( \
00516     (SUM8(m)) + \
00517     (CENTER(m)))
00518 
00519 
00520 #define SUM4REG(m) ( \
00521     (n & m) + \
00522     (w & m) + \
00523     (e & m) + \
00524     (s & m))
00525 
00526 #define SUM8REG(m) ( \
00527     (SUM4REG(m)) + \
00528     (nw & m) + \
00529     (ne & m) + \
00530     (sw & m) + \
00531     (se & m))
00532 
00533 #define SUM9REG(m) ( \
00534     (SUM8REG(m)) + \
00535     (c & m))
00536 
00537 // This is half baked
00538 #define CAM_REG_RECT_LOOP(BODY, \
00539                           WIDTH, HEIGHT, \
00540                           FROMMEM, FROMSTRIDE, \
00541                           TOMEM, TOSTRIDE) \
00542     { \
00543         long x, y; \
00544         long width = WIDTH; \
00545         long height = HEIGHT; \
00546         Byte *fromMem = FROMMEM; \
00547         long fromStride = FROMSTRIDE; \
00548         Byte *toMem = TOMEM; \
00549         long toStride = TOSTRIDE; \
00550         for (y = 0; \
00551              y < height; \
00552              y++) { \
00553             register Byte nw, n, ne, w, c, e, sw, s, se; \
00554             n = fromMem[0]; \
00555             ne = fromMem[1]; \
00556             c = fromMem[fromStride]; \
00557             e = fromMem[fromStride + 1]; \
00558             s = fromMem[fromStride + fromStride]; \
00559             se = fromMem[fromStride + fromStride + 1]; \
00560             for (x = 0; \
00561                  x < fromWidth; \
00562                  x++) { \
00563                 nw = n; n = ne; ne = fromMem[2]; \
00564                 w = c; c = e; e = fromMem[fromStride + 2]; \
00565                 sw = s; s = se; se = fromMem[fromStride + fromStride + 2]; \
00566                 BODY(toMem, nw, n, ne, w, c, e, sw, s, se); \
00567                 fromMem++; toMem++; \
00568             } \
00569             fromMem += fromStride - fromWidth; \
00570             toMem += toStride - fromWidth; \
00571         } \
00572     }
00573 
00574 
00575 // This is half baked
00576 #define CAM_XTRACT_RECT_LOOP(BODY, \
00577                              WIDTH, HEIGHT, \
00578                              FROMMEM, FROMSTRIDE, \
00579                              TOMEM, TOSTRIDE) \
00580     { \
00581         long x, y; \
00582         long width = WIDTH; \
00583         long height = HEIGHT; \
00584         Byte *fromMem = FROMMEM; \
00585         long fromStride = FROMSTRIDE; \
00586         Byte *toMem = TOMEM; \
00587         long toStride = TOSTRIDE; \
00588         for (y = 0; \
00589              y < height; \
00590              y++) { \
00591             QUAD l0 = (fromMem[0]<<8) + \
00592                        fromMem[1], \
00593                  l1 = (fromMem[fromStride]<<8) + \
00594                        fromMem[fromStride+1], \
00595                  l2 = (fromMem[fromStride+fromStride]<<8) + \
00596                        fromMem[fromStride+fromStride+1]; \
00597             for (x = 0; \
00598                  x < w; \
00599                  x++) { \
00600                 l0 = (l0<<8) + fromMem[2]; \
00601                 l1 = (l1<<8) + fromMem[fromStride+2]; \
00602                 l2 = (l2<<8) + fromMem[fromStride+fromStride+2]; \
00603                 BODY(toMem, \
00604                      NORTHWEST(0xff), NORTH(0xff), NORTHEAST(0xff), \
00605                      WEST(0xff), CENTER(0xff), EAST(0xff), \
00606                      SOUTHWEST(0xff), SOUTH(0xff), SOUTHEAST(0xff)) \
00607                 fromMem++; toMem++; mask++; \
00608             } \
00609             fromMem += fromStride - width; \
00610             toMem += toStride - width; \
00611         } \
00612     }
00613 
00614 
00615 #define CAM_REG_LOOP_BODY(BODY) \
00616     {   Byte *front = frontMem; \
00617         Byte *back = backMem + \
00618                      (backBorder - 1) + \
00619                      ((backBorder - 1) * backRowBytes); \
00620         long yy; \
00621         for (yy = 0; \
00622              yy < height; \
00623              yy++) { \
00624             Byte nw, n, ne, w, c, e, sw, s, se; \
00625             n = back[0]; \
00626             ne = back[1]; \
00627             c = back[backRowBytes]; \
00628             e = back[backRowBytes + 1]; \
00629             s = back[backRowBytes + backRowBytes]; \
00630             se = back[backRowBytes + backRowBytes + 1]; \
00631             long xx; \
00632             for (xx = 0; \
00633                  xx < width; \
00634                  xx++) { \
00635                 nw = n; n = ne; ne = back[2]; \
00636                 w = c; c = e; e = back[backRowBytes + 2]; \
00637                 sw = s; s = se; se = back[backRowBytes + backRowBytes + 2]; \
00638                 BODY; \
00639                 back++; front++; \
00640             } \
00641             back += backRowBytes - width; \
00642             front += screenRowBytes - width; \
00643         } \
00644     }
00645 
00646 
00647 #define CAM_MASKED_LOOP_BODY(BODY) \
00648     if (!masked) { \
00649         CAM_LOOP_BODY(BODY); \
00650     } else { \
00651         Byte *front = frontMem; \
00652         Byte *back = backMem + \
00653                      (backBorder - 1) + \
00654                      ((backBorder - 1) * backRowBytes); \
00655         Byte *mask = maskMem; \
00656         Byte maskClip = maskClip; \
00657         long w = width; \
00658         if (maskWidth < w) w = maskWidth; \
00659         long h = height; \
00660         if (maskHeight < h) h = maskHeight; \
00661         long yy; \
00662         for (yy = 0; \
00663              yy < h; \
00664              yy++) { \
00665             QUAD l0 = (back[0]<<8) + \
00666                        back[1], \
00667                  l1 = (back[backRowBytes]<<8) + \
00668                        back[backRowBytes+1], \
00669                  l2 = (back[backRowBytes+backRowBytes]<<8) + \
00670                        back[backRowBytes+backRowBytes+1]; \
00671             Byte m; \
00672             long xx; \
00673             for (xx = 0; \
00674                  xx < w; \
00675                  xx++) { \
00676                 l0 = (l0<<8) + back[2]; \
00677                 l1 = (l1<<8) + back[backRowBytes+2]; \
00678                 l2 = (l2<<8) + back[backRowBytes+backRowBytes+2]; \
00679                 m = *mask; \
00680                 if (m > maskClip) { \
00681                     BODY; \
00682                 } \
00683                 back++; front++; mask++; \
00684             } \
00685             back += backRowBytes - w; \
00686             front += screenRowBytes - w; \
00687             mask += maskRowBytes - w; \
00688         } \
00689     }
00690 
00691 
00692 #define CAM_MASKED_REG_LOOP_BODY(BODY) \
00693     if (clipRects == 0) { \
00694         CAM_REG_LOOP_BODY(BODY) \
00695     } else { \
00696         RECT *rect = rectList; \
00697         long rect_count = clipRects; \
00698         while (rect_count-- > 0) { \
00699             long x1 = rect->left; \
00700             long x2 = rect->right; \
00701             Byte *front = frontMem; \
00702             Byte *back = backMem + \
00703                          (backBorder - 1) + \
00704                          ((backBorder - 1) * backRowBytes); \
00705             front += x1 + (rect->top * screenRowBytes); \
00706             back += x1 + (rect->top * backRowBytes); \
00707             long yy; \
00708             for (yy = rect->top; \
00709                  yy < rect->bottom; \
00710                  yy++) { \
00711                 register Byte nw, n, ne, w, c, e, sw, s, se; \
00712                 n = back[0]; \
00713                 ne = back[1]; \
00714                 c = back[backRowBytes]; \
00715                 e = back[backRowBytes + 1]; \
00716                 s = back[backRowBytes + backRowBytes]; \
00717                 se = back[backRowBytes + backRowBytes + 1]; \
00718                 long xx; \
00719                 for (xx = x1; \
00720                      xx < x2; \
00721                      xx++) { \
00722                     nw = n; n = ne; ne = back[2]; \
00723                     w = c; c = e; e = back[backRowBytes + 2]; \
00724                     sw = s; s = se; se = back[backRowBytes + backRowBytes + 2]; \
00725                     BODY; \
00726                     back++; front++; \
00727                 } \
00728                 back += backRowBytes - x2 + x1; \
00729                 front += screenRowBytes - x2 + x1; \
00730             } \
00731             rect++; \
00732         } \
00733     }
00734 
00735 
00736 #define CAM_LOOP(RULE) \
00737     CAM_LOOP_BODY(*front = (RULE))
00738

00761     CAM_REG_LOOP((c << 4) | rule[(NEIGHBORHOOD)])

00768     CAM_MASKED_REG_LOOP((c << 2) | rule[(NEIGHBORHOOD)])

00771 #define UPPER6HEAT() \
00772     ((last += (nw + n + ne + w + frob + e + sw + s + se)), \
00773      (heat = (last >> 3) & 0xfc), \
00774      (last = last & 0x1f), \
00775      heat)
00776 
00777 
00778 #define UPPER4HEAT() \
00779     ((last += (nw + n + ne + w + frob + e + sw + s + se)), \
00780      (heat = (last >> 3) & 0xf0), \
00781      (last = last & 0x7f), \
00782      heat)
00783

00786     CAM_MASKED_REG_LOOP_BODY(*front = UPPER6HEAT() + (RULE))

00789 #define CAM_MASKED_REG_TABLE_HEAT6_LOOP(NEIGHBORHOOD) \
00790     CAM_MASKED_REG_LOOP(UPPER6HEAT() + rule[(NEIGHBORHOOD)])
